item.title: Need help with spawning objects!
item.dc:creator: @frugoo_scape frugoo scape
item.description:
@frugoo_scape wrote:

Use these ways to spawn objects.

  1. You can put objects in your worldObjects.cfg if you have the file.
  2. Make the server spon objects when it loads a new area i think the case for it is 121. Make a void for the new objects and put it under that case. In the new void that you made put the objects you want it to load using this void to spawn the objects " AddGlobalObject(ObjectId, X, Y, face, Type);//portal".
    FACE: 0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH
    ObjectType: 0-3 wall objects, 4-8 wall decoration, 9: diag. walls, 10-11 world objects, 12-21: roofs, 22: floor decoration

Hope that helps.
-Frugoo Scape

Read full topic
